survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Home Automation Systems Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and adoption barriers related to home automation systems to help manufacturers and service providers improve product offerings.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with home automation systems?
answer_options: Very familiar - I currently use one or more systems
Somewhat familiar - I know about them but don't use any
Not very familiar - I've heard of them but don't know details
questions.client_notes: This introductory question helps segment respondents by familiarity level. Consider scaling follow-up questions based on responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. Randomize option order if needed.
